titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR (CARE PERSONNEL) - Description

div.p: RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR (CARE PERSONNEL) is the same as the attribute RESTRICTIVE INTERVENTION POST-INCIDENT REVIEW HELD INDICATOR to indicate if a Restrictive Intervention Post-Incident Review for Care Personnel was held within 24 hours of the incident of a Restrictive Intervention.
